trans-unit.source: Provides access to all font-related style information about an ASP.NET mobile control.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo> class provides a subset of the functionality of the Web Forms <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo?displayProperty=fullName> class.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is bold.
The default value is `NotSet`.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A> property takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration, not a Boolean value.
An enumerated value indicating whether the font is bold.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is italic.
The default value is `NotSet`.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A> property takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption>, not a Boolean value.
An enumerated value indicating whether the font is italic.
Gets or sets the name of the specified font.
The default value is an empty string ("").
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The name of the specified font.
Gets or sets the specified font size.
Must be of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize"></xref>.
The default value is `NotSet`.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
You can use any of the following font sizes: `Large`, `Normal`, `NotSet`, or `Small`.
An enumerated value indicating the specified font size.
Converts the specified value to its equivalent string representation.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A string that represents the current object.
